title: Market headed for record highs; buy metals, PSU banks, and energy stocks on every dip: CA Rudramurthy BV
summary: Indian markets are showing renewed momentum, with Nifty confirming a trend reversal and entering a bullish phase. CA Rudramurthy BV of Vachana Investments advises buying on every dip, anticipating Nifty to test 25,450-25,500 and Bank Nifty to hit new highs. He remains bullish on metals, PSU banks, and new-age companies, expecting FIIs to return as buyers.

title: Glottis investors stare at steep loss as stock crashes 37% from issue price
summary: Glottis Ltd shares experienced a sharp decline on their market debut. The stock fell significantly on both the BSE and NSE. This happened despite the company's established presence in the logistics sector. The IPO was priced at Rs 129 per share. The company raised Rs 307 crore through the IPO. Investor sentiment appeared subdued during the listing.

title: 10 IPOs listing on exchanges tomorrow could offer up to 27% returns
summary: ​Top 10 IPOs debuting tomorrow saw mixed investor response. Infinity Infoway, Advance Agrolife, and Sheel Biotech led with high subscriptions and GMPs, while several others recorded flat or muted market interest.

title: Glottis shares make weak D-St debut, list at 35% discount to IPO price
summary: Glottis, a Chennai logistics company, experienced a weak market debut. Its shares listed at a discount on both NSE and BSE. The IPO saw a modest investor response despite the company's strong financials. Funds raised will support fleet expansion and capacity enhancement. Glottis offers integrated logistics solutions globally. Analysts suggest the IPO was fully priced, impacting near-term gains.

title: WeWork India IPO subscribed 1.15 times on Day 3; Check latest GMP, subscription status, other details here
summary: WeWork India IPO was booked 1.15 times as of the final day of public subscription on the Indian stock market. The IPO is estimated to be listed on the BSE and NSE indices on Friday, 10 October 2025.

title: Top Gainers & Losers on Oct 07: RHI Magnesita India, Vodafone Idea, Ircon, Anant Raj, Nykaa among top gainers today
summary: The Indian stock market saw its fourth consecutive winning session, with the Nifty 50 and S&amp;P BSE Sensex both gaining 0.14%. Broader markets outperformed, led by Nifty Realty's 1.42% surge.

title: Stock market today: 130 stocks hit 52-week lows, 175 stocks at 52-week high as Nifty 50, Sensex end in green
summary: Stock market today: On Tuesday, 175 stocks reached 52-week highs, while 130 hit lows. Indian equities ended positively, with the Nifty 50 closing at 25,108 and the Sensex gaining over 137 points. Analysts suggest cautious optimism amid volatility as investors await Q2 results.

title: Advance Agrolife IPO listing date tomorrow. Here’s what GMP signals about debut of shares on Dalal Street
summary: Advance Agrolife IPO listing date is October 8, and the Advance Agrolife shares will be listed on both the stock exchanges, BSE and NSE. Ahead of share debut, Advance Agrolife IPO GMP today signals strong listing.
